segments.text: I see the water running and running, filling the sink and spilling everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is just standing there, drying dishes like nothing is happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think she’s in her own little world.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is reaching for the cookies, and the stool looks like it’s about to tip.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just waiting, not even trying to stop him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe how careless they all are.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is making the floor so slippery, someone is going to fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the woman will ever notice the mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene is just chaotic.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the kitchen is going to be ruined by the time she realizes what’s happening.
segments.speaker: PAR
